original_title: Barty's Brew-Ha-Ha 2: The Legend of the Skeleton's Curse
overview: Barty Anderson is recruited by the mysterious Stewart Clammington to find a dead body filled to the brim with gold. They work together with teamwork and friendship to find it, but all is not what it seems....
title: Barty's Brew-Ha-Ha 2: The Legend of the Skeleton's Curse
